meanings.definition: A tool or device used for abrading or smoothing a surface.
meanings.sent1: The abraders in the workshop helped smooth out the rough edges of the wood.
meanings.sent2: The workers used abraders to make the metal surface shiny and smooth.
meanings.sent3: The abraders decided to take a break after a long day of smoothing surfaces.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was like an abrader, slowly but surely smoothing out any obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the abraders at work filled the room, creating a rhythmic melody.
